page.title: 15Families And Homes
page.content: The avarage family in Kennethmont in the 1980's has 2-3 children. Most families have at least one car sometimes more.All homes use electricity as a source of power and there are numerous electrical devices to help with housework and for entertainment in all of our homes.At home we spend a lot of our leisure time watching television listening to music recordings or watching video tapes.Most families only get together for occasions such as weddings and christenings or for festivals such as Christmas or Hogmanay.For the first time home computers are becoming popular and many people are getting one for their home.Nowadays many families are separated by great distances with family members living and working in other towns or cities or even in other countries.
